review.title: An Analysis of General Fuzzy Logic and Fuzzy Reasoning Method
review.abstract: In this article, we describe the fuzzy logic, fuzzy language and algorithms as the basis of fuzzy reasoning, one of the intelligent information processing method, and then describe the general fuzzy reasoning method.
